import React, { Component } from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import { connect } from "react-redux"; import * as actions from "../../actions/index"; class BookingPayment extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props); } onBooking = () => { let INFO_BOOKING = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem("INFO_BOOKING")); this.props.bookingTicket({ hoTen : (INFO_BOOKING.ho + " " + INFO_BOOKING.ten) }); } render() { let gia = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem("GIA")); return (

giá vé {gia} VND
thành tiền: {gia} VND
); } } var mapStateToProps = (state) => { return { }; }; var mapDispatchToProps = (dispatch, props) => { return { bookingTicket: (info_booking) => { dispatch(actions.actBookingTicketCallApi(info_booking)); }, }; }; export default connect(mapStateToProps, mapDispatchToProps)(BookingPayment);
